name: rivet-node_example
description: Simple example how to run rivet-node and execute your rivet graphs

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p node_modules/@gentrace/core/dist/models && echo "export const placeholder = {};" > node_modules/@gentrace/core/dist/models/pipelines-get200-response-pipelines-inner.js && echo "export interface PipelinesGet200ResponsePipelinesInner {}" > node_modules/@gentrace/core/dist/models/pipelines-get200-response-pipelines-inner.d.ts
